DOC.brief_summary: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) heterogeneous clinical presentation comprise reproductive ( hyperandrogenism , menstrual irregularity , anovulation , infertility , pregnancy complication ) , metabolic [ insulin resistance ( IR ) , increase type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) risk factor ] psychological feature ( worsen quality life increase anxiety depression ) Whether prolong fast Ramadan break insulin resistance state polycystic ovarian syndrome subsequently improve ovulation spontaneous pregnancy happen without ovarian stimulation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Ramadan Fasting Ovulation Insuline Resistance Patients With PCOS
DOC.detailed_description: Question study : The question raise whether prolonged fast Ramadan break insulin resistance state polycystic ovarian syndrome improve metabolic syndrome prolong fast decrease glucose level , insulin level , insulin resistance marker adipokines subsequently improve ovarian function cause spontaneous ovulation .
